title: Dam Removal Science Database
description: A dataset containing information about published dam removal science.

AccessionKey.title: Accession Key
AccessionKey.description: sequential automatically generated number, there are some gaps due to dams and citations being removed from analysis due to being out of the study scope

science_dam_id.title: Dam Identifier in Science Database
science_dam_id.description: A unique number assigned to each dam in database. In original database this is called DamAccessionNumber. There are some gaps due to dams and citations being removed from analysis due to being out of the study scope

science_citation_id.title: Citation Identifier in Science Database
science_citation_id.description: A unique number assigned to each Citation record in the database. In original database this is called CitationAccessionNumber.  There are some gaps due to dams and citations being removed from analysis due to being out of the study scope

science_results_id.title: Results Identifier in Science Database
science_results_id.description: Sequential automatically generated number assigned to each Results record in the database. In original database this is called ResultsID. There are some gaps due to dams and citations being removed from analysis due to being out of the study scope

science_design_id.title: Design Identifier in Science Database
science_design_id.description: Sequential automatically generated number assigned to each Design record in the database. In original database this is called DesignID. There are some gaps due to dams and citations being removed from analysis due to being out of the study scope

doi_url.title: Digital Object Identifier URL of the Citation
doi_url.description: Digital Object Identifier (DOI) assigned to the manuscript citation. Uses format https://doi.org/XXX. If no DOI is available this field is blank

citation_short.title: Short Form of Citation
citation_short.description: Short citation associated with dam removal science publication. Citation includes authors, publication year and title
examples: Amos, R. A., 2008, Upstream River Responses to Low Head Dam Removal

CitationID.title: Citation Identifier
CitationID.description: File name of PDF, stored in Google Drive. Comprised of primary author, second author or etal, year of publication, and journal name/ conference name/ thesis/ book title, etc

CitationAuthor.title: Citation Author
CitationAuthor.description: All authors of associated publication, using format last name followed by a comma and initials
examples: Burroughs, B. A.; Hayes, D. B., Klomp, K. D., Hansen, J. F. & Mistak, J.

CitationTitle.title: Citation Title
examples: Sampling and Modeling of Sediment Transport and Reservoir Erosion Following Dam Removal: Milltown Dam, Montana

CitationJournalOrConferenceName.title: Citation Journal Or ConferenceName
CitationJournalOrConferenceName.description: Name of journal or conference where citation is published

CitationYear.title: Citation Year
CitationYear.description: Year citation was published. Blanks indicate the publication year is unknown, in the case of unpublished reports

CitationVolume.title: Citation Volume
CitationVolume.description: If citation is published in a journal, the associated volume number

CitationNumber.title: Citation Number
CitationNumber.description: If citation is published in a journal, the associated issue number

CitationPages.title: Citation Pages
CitationPages.description: Range of page numbers in the journal or total pages in the thesis/ report

CitationBooktitle.title: Citation Book Title
CitationBooktitle.description: If CitationDocumentCategory is a book, the title of the book
examples: River Basins, Reservoir Sedimentation and Water Resources

CitationEditor.title: Citation Editor
CitationEditor.description: Editor associated with the publication. Field left blank if not applicable or available
examples: De Graff, J V & Evans, J E

CitationPublisher.title: Citation Publisher
CitationPublisher.description: Publisher associated with the publication. Field left blank if not applicable or available

CitationInstitution.title: Citation Institution
CitationInstitution.description: The publishing agency/institution used if CitationDocumentCategory is any type of Report
examples: South Carolina Department of Natural Resources

CitationSchool.title: Citation School
CitationSchool.description: If the CitationType is a Thesis/Dissertation, the school where thesis was published

CitationURI.title: Citation URI
CitationURI.description: Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for the citation within the Science Base catalog

AR_ID.title: AR_ID
AR_ID.description: The unique alphanumeric identifier assigned to individual dams by American Rivers. This field is blank if the dam removal is not in American Rivers' database of dam removals in the USA

DamName.title: Dam Name
DamName.description: A unique name given to dam. If dam has more than one name, alternate names are given in a separate field. If no name provided in text, a name was assigned by USGS with river name followed by a unique number

DamNameAlternate.title: Dam Alternate Names
DamNameAlternate.description: Alternate names given to the dam. If dam has more than one alternate name, the are each listed separated by a comma

DamRiverName.title: Dam River Name
DamRiverName.description: name of river where dam is located

DamRiverNameAlternate.title: Dam River Name Alternate
DamRiverNameAlternate.description: Alternate name of river where dam is located, if multiple names were referenced

DamLocation.title: Dam Location
DamLocation.description: a general description of dam location. if in United States: City, County or Area and State. If outside of United States: City or Region and Country

DamState_Province.title: Dam State or Province
DamState_Province.description: if dam location is in United States, state in which the dam is located, 2 letter standard state postal abbreviation. If located within Canada, name of province. If located outside of US or Canada, field null

DamLatitude.title: Dam Latitude
DamLatitude.description: Latitude in decimal degrees of dam location

DamLongitude.title: Dam Longitude
DamLongitude.description: Longitude in decimal degrees of dam location

DamMapDatum.title: Dam Map Datum
DamMapDatum.description: coordinate system used for associated Latitude and Longitude of dam location

DamAccuracyOfLocation.title: Dam Accuracy Of Location
DamAccuracyOfLocation.description: confidence in spacial accuracy of dam latitude and longitude. Field used only when location found in google maps and not reported by publication or USACE NID

DamYearBuiltOriginalStructure.title: Dam Year Built Original Structure
DamYearBuiltOriginalStructure.description: the year a previous dam was built in or near location of dam that was removed during study. If a decade is reported (ex: 1880's), the database will report the median year in that decade (ex: 1885).

DamYearBuiltRemovedStructure.title: Dam Year Built Removed Structure
DamYearBuiltRemovedStructure.description: the year the dam was built that was removed during study. If a decade is reported (ex: 1880's), the database will report the median year in that decade (ex: 1885)

DamMonthRemovalBegan.title: Month Dam Removal Began
DamMonthRemovalBegan.description: the month dam removal began. Season data: If a removal is reported as a season (Winter, Spring, Summer and Fall), the following month is selected and the season reported is documented in the notes (Winter = December, Spring = April, Summer = July, Fall = October)

DamDayRemovalBegan.title: Day Dam Removal Began
DamDayRemovalBegan.description: the day within the month that dam removal began

DamMonthRemovalFinished.title: Month Dam Removal Finished
DamMonthRemovalFinished.description: the month dam removal finished. Season data: If a removal is reported as a season (Winter, Spring, Summer and Fall), the following month is selected and the season reported is documented in the notes (Winter = December, Spring = April, Summer = July, Fall = October)

DamDayRemovalFinished.title: Day Dam Removal Finished
DamDayRemovalFinished.description: the day within the month that dam removal finished

DamYearRemovalFinished.title: Year Dam Removal Finished
DamYearRemovalFinished.description: the year dam removal finished. If publication reports only one date/year for removal, the year is placed in DamYearRemovalFinished

DamNumberOfDaysToRemoveDam.title: Number Of Days To Remove Dam
DamNumberOfDaysToRemoveDam.description: a calculated number of days from start to end of removal. Calculated by USGS using removal start and end dates, if both provided

DamRemovalMethod.title: Dam Removal Method
DamRemovalMethod.description: categorized method of removal based on description in publication. Field left blank if unknown

DamMotivationForRemoval.title: Motivation For Dam Removal
DamMotivationForRemoval.description: categorized motivation of removal based on description in publication. Field left blank if unknown

DamFunction.title: Dam Function
DamFunction.description: categorized dam function based on publication. If not specified in publication, USACE NID category was used. Field left blank if unknown

DamOperation.title: Dam Operation
DamOperation.description: categorized operation of dam based on publication

DamOwner.title: Dam Owner
DamOwner.description: name of company or person that owned the dam

DamHeight_m.title: Dam Height in Meters
DamHeight_m.description: height of dam, measured in meters

DamWidth_m.title: Dam Width in Meters
DamWidth_m.description: distance along the top of the dam, measured in meters

DamReservoirVolume_m3.title: Dam Reservoir Volume in Cubic Meters
DamReservoirVolume_m3.description: total storage space in reservoir, measured in cubic meters

DamReservoirSurfaceArea_km2.title: Dam Reservoir Surface Area in Kilometers
DamReservoirSurfaceArea_km2.description: surface area, in square kilometers, of the impoundment

DamLengthOfReservoir_m.title: Length Of Reservoir in Meters
DamLengthOfReservoir_m.description: length of reservoir from dam structure to end of pool, measured in meters

DamUpstreamDrainageArea_km2.title: Dam Upstream Drainage Area in Kilometers
DamUpstreamDrainageArea_km2.description: Area of upstream drainage associated with river and dam, measured in square kilometers

DataSource_UpstreamDrainageArea.title: Data Source Upstream Drainage Area
DataSource_UpstreamDrainageArea.description: source and associated data for DamUpstreamDrainageArea_km2. When more than one value is reported, value and source separated by comma

DamAreaOfEntireWatershed_km2.title: Area of Entire Watershed of Dam in Square Kilometers
DamAreaOfEntireWatershed_km2.description: area of watershed associated with river and dam, measured in square kilometers

DataSource_WatershedArea.title: Data Source Watershed Area
DataSource_WatershedArea.description: source and associated data for DamAreaOfEntireWatershed_km2. When more than one value was reported, value and source separated by comma

DamRiverWidthUpstreamOfImpoundment_m.title: River Width Upstream Of Impoundment in Meters
DamRiverWidthUpstreamOfImpoundment_m.description: width of river, upstream of reservoir, measured in meters

DamStrahlerStreamOrder.title: Strahler Stream Order at Dam
DamStrahlerStreamOrder.description: Strahler stream order (1-6) of river being impounded by dam

DamStoredReservoirSedimentVolume_m3.title: Dam Stored Reservoir Sediment Volume in Cubic Meters
DamStoredReservoirSedimentVolume_m3.description: volume of sediment being impounded by dam, measured in cubic meters

DamRiverAnnualSedimentDischarge.title: Dam River Annual Sediment Discharge
DamRiverAnnualSedimentDischarge.description: annual sediment discharge of river above dam, various units (units specified within each record)

DamLengthOfStoredSedimentUpstreamOfDam_m.title: Length of Stored Sediment Upstream of Dam in Meters
DamLengthOfStoredSedimentUpstreamOfDam_m.description: length of reservoir from dam structure to end of pool, measured in meters

DamNIDID.title: National Inventory of Dams Identifier
DamNIDID.description: unique number combined with state abbreviation, assigned by USACE NID (U.S. Army Corps of Engineers, National Inventory of Dams)

DamRiverMeanDischarge_CMS.title: Dam River Mean Discharge CMS
DamRiverMeanDischarge_CMS.description: mean discharge of river being impounded by dam, upstream from impoundment, measured in cubic meters per second

DamAssociatedUSGSStreamGaugingStation.title: Dam Associated USGS Stream Gauging Station
DamAssociatedUSGSStreamGaugingStation.description: ID number of USGS or Canada Water Office river gauging station. Derived from citation or USGS website if gauging station location was close to dam location

DamGaugingStationDataYears.title: Dam Gauging Station Data Years
DamGaugingStationDataYears.description: range of years used to calculate DamRiverMeanDischarge_CMS if USGS Stream Gauging Station data used

DamWebsite1.title: Dam Website 1
DamWebsite1.description: website used to gather additional dam data not found in publications

DamWebsite2.title: Dam Website 2
DamWebsite2.description: website used to gather additional dam data not found in publications

DamWebsite3.title: Dam Website 3
DamWebsite3.description: website used to gather additional dam data not found in publications

DamNotes.title: Dam Notes
DamNotes.description: notes relating to any field name beginning with Dam. May include information on how values were determined.

DesignTypeOfStudy.title: Design Type Of Study
DesignTypeOfStudy.description: categorized study type based on description in publication

DesignNumOfDamsRemoved.title: Design Number of Dams Removed
DesignNumOfDamsRemoved.description: the total number of dams removals in study

DesignPRERemovalMonitoringDuration.title: Design PreRemoval Monitoring Duration
DesignPRERemovalMonitoringDuration.description: the total number of years dam was studied before removal

DesignPRERemovalNumberSamplingYears.title: Design PreRemoval Number Sampling Years
DesignPRERemovalNumberSamplingYears.description: the number of years data was collected before removal

DesignDURINGRemovalMonitoringDuration.title: Design During Removal Monitoring Duration
DesignDURINGRemovalMonitoringDuration.description: the total number of years dam was studied during removal

DesignDURINGRemovalNumberSamplingYears.title: Design During Removal Number Sampling Years
DesignDURINGRemovalNumberSamplingYears.description: the number of years data was collected during removal

DesignPOSTRemovalMonitoringDuration.title: Design Post Removal Monitoring Duration
DesignPOSTRemovalMonitoringDuration.description: the total number of years dam was studied after removal

DesignPOSTRemovalNumberSamplingYears.title: Design Post Removal Number Sampling Years
DesignPOSTRemovalNumberSamplingYears.description: the number of years data was collected after removal

DesignWithinBasinReferenceSitesPresence.title: Design Within Basin Reference Sites Presence
DesignWithinBasinReferenceSitesPresence.description: presence or absence of reference or control sites within the basin where the dam was removed

DesignOut-of-BasinReferenceSitesPresence.title: Design Out-of-Basin Reference Sites Presence
DesignOut-of-BasinReferenceSitesPresence.description: presence or absence of reference or control sites outside of the basin where the dam was removed

DesignDownstreamImpactSitesPresence.title: Design Downstream Impact Sites Presence
DesignDownstreamImpactSitesPresence.description: presence or absence of impact sites downstream of the dam removal

DesignWithinImpoundmentImpactSitesPresen.title: Design Within Impoundment Impact Sites Presence
DesignWithinImpoundmentImpactSitesPresen.description: presence or absence of impact sites within the former impoundment

DesignNotes.title: Design Notes
DesignNotes.description: notes relating to any field name beginning with Design. May include information on how values were determined or more details about the study design.

ResultsCitationID.title: Results Citation ID
ResultsCitationID.description: File name of PDF, stored in Google Drive. Comprised of primary author, second author or etal, year of publication, and journal name/ conference name/ thesis/ book title, etc

ResultsPrimaryFocusOfStudy.title: Results Primary Focus of Study
ResultsPrimaryFocusOfStudy.description: categorized primary focus of the study

ResultsGradient.title: Results Gradient
ResultsGradient.description: Binary response if gradient was studied in citation, 0=Not Studied, 1=Studied

ResultsTotalSedimentFlux.title: Results Total Sediment Flux
ResultsTotalSedimentFlux.description: Binary response if total sediment flux was studied in citation, 0=Not Studied, 1=Studied

ResultsSedimentBudget.title: Results Sediment Budget
ResultsSedimentBudget.description: Binary response if sediment budget was studied in citation, 0=Not Studied, 1=Studied

ResultsLongitudinalProfiles.title: Results Longitudinal Profiles
ResultsLongitudinalProfiles.description: Binary response if logitudinal profiles were studied in citation, 0=Not Studied, 1=Studied

ResultsLateralProfiles.title: Results Lateral Profiles
ResultsLateralProfiles.description: Binary response if lateral profiles were studied in citation, 0=Not Studied, 1=Studied

ResultsDischarge.title: Results Discharge
ResultsDischarge.description: Binary response if discharge was studied in citation, 0=Not Studied, 1=Studied

ResultsChannelHydraulics.title: Results Channel Hydraulics
ResultsChannelHydraulics.description: Binary response if channel hydraulics was studied in citation, 0=Not Studied, 1=Studied

ResultsGrainSizeDistributions.title: Results Grain Size Distributions
ResultsGrainSizeDistributions.description: Binary response if grain size distributions were studied in citation, 0=Not Studied, 1=Studied

ResultsBedload.title: Results Bedload
ResultsBedload.description: Binary response if bedload was studied in citation, 0=Not Studied, 1=Studied

ResultsKnickpointHeadcutMigration.title: Results Knickpoint Headcut Migration
ResultsKnickpointHeadcutMigration.description: Binary response if knickpoint headcut migration was studied in citation, 0=Not Studied, 1=Studied

ResultsReservoirSedimentErosion.title: Results Reservoir Sediment Erosion
ResultsReservoirSedimentErosion.description: Binary response if reservoir sediment erosion was studied in citation, 0=Not Studied, 1=Studied

ResultsWaterTableGroundwater.title: Results Water Table Groundwater
ResultsWaterTableGroundwater.description: Binary response if water table/groundwater was studied in citation, 0=Not Studied, 1=Studied

ResultsWaterTurbidity.title: Results Water Turbidity
ResultsWaterTurbidity.description: Binary response if water turbidity was studied in citation, 0=Not Studied, 1=Studied

ResultsSuspendedSediment.title: Results Suspended Sediment
ResultsSuspendedSediment.description: Binary response if suspended sediment was studied in citation, 0=Not Studied, 1=Studied

ResultsNutrientConcentrations.title: Results Nutrient Concentrations
ResultsNutrientConcentrations.description: Binary response if nutrient concentrations were studied in citation, 0=Not Studied, 1=Studied

ResultsWaterTemperature.title: Results Water Temperature
ResultsWaterTemperature.description: Binary response if water temperature was studied in citation, 0=Not Studied, 1=Studied

ResultsDissolvedOxygen.title: Results Dissolved Oxygen
ResultsDissolvedOxygen.description: Binary response if dissolved oxygen was studied in citation, 0=Not Studied, 1=Studied

ResultsContaminants.title: Results Contaminants
ResultsContaminants.description: Binary response if contaminants were studied in citation, 0=Not Studied, 1=Studied

ResultsLidarAerialPhotosDEM.title: Results Lidar Aerial Photos DEM
ResultsLidarAerialPhotosDEM.description: Binary response if Lidar, Aerial Photos or DEMs (Digital Elevation Models) were studied in citation, 0=Not Studied, 1=Studied

ResultsFishAbundanceCommunityStructure.title: Results Fish Abundance Community Structure
ResultsFishAbundanceCommunityStructure.description: Binary response if fish abundance or community structure was studied in citation, 0=Not Studied, 1=Studied

ResultsFishPassage.title: Results Fish Passage
ResultsFishPassage.description: Binary response if fish passage was studied in citation, 0=Not Studied, 1=Studied

ResultsAquaticInvertebrates.title: Results Aquatic Invertebrates
ResultsAquaticInvertebrates.description: Binary response if aquatic invertebrates were studied in citation, 0=Not Studied, 1=Studied

ResultsBiofilm.title: Results Biofilm
ResultsBiofilm.description: Binary response if biofilm was studied in citation, 0=Not Studied, 1=Studied

ResultsDetritus.title: Results Detritus
ResultsDetritus.description: Binary response if detritus was studied in citation, 0=Not Studied, 1=Studied

ResultsStreamMetabolism.title: Results Stream Metabolism
ResultsStreamMetabolism.description: Binary response if stream metabolism was studied in citation, 0=Not Studied, 1=Studied

ResultsNutrientUptakeCycling.title: Results Nutrient Uptake Cycling
ResultsNutrientUptakeCycling.description: Binary response if nutrient uptake cycling was studied in citation, 0=Not Studied, 1=Studied

ResultsRiparianVegetation.title: Results Riparian Vegetation
ResultsRiparianVegetation.description: Binary response if riparian vegetation was studied in citation, 0=Not Studied, 1=Studied

ResultsBirds.title: Results Birds
ResultsBirds.description: Binary response if birds were studied in citation, 0=Not Studied, 1=Studied

ResultsInvasiveSpecies.title: Results Invasive Species
ResultsInvasiveSpecies.description: Binary response if invasive species were studied in citation, 0=Not Studied, 1=Studied

ResultsFreshwaterMussels.title: Results Freshwater Mussels
ResultsFreshwaterMussels.description: Binary response if freshwater mussels were studied in citation, 0=Not Studied, 1=Studied

ResultsMarineEstuarineImpacts.title: Results Marine Estuarine Impacts
ResultsMarineEstuarineImpacts.description: Binary response if marine estuarine impacts were studied in citation, 0=Not Studied, 1=Studied

ResultsSpeciesRichnessDiversity.title: Results Species Richness Diversity
ResultsSpeciesRichnessDiversity.description: Binary response if species richness diversity was studied in citation, 0=Not Studied, 1=Studied

ResultsFoodWebs.title: Results Food Webs
ResultsFoodWebs.description: Binary response if food webs were studied in citation, 0=Not Studied, 1=Studied

ResultsWetland.title: Results Wetland
ResultsWetland.description: Binary response if wetlands were studied in citation, 0=Not Studied, 1=Studied

ResultsNotes.title: Results Notes
ResultsNotes.description: Notes relating to any field name beginning with Results. May include information on how values were determined.
examples: fish assemblage, spatial and temporal changes in fish community
